content: In Toki Pona, the grammatical particle "li" indicates that whatever word comes after it is being used as a verb.
translations: ita:In Toki Pona, la particella grammaticale li indica che qualsiasi parola venga dopo di essa Ã¨ usata come verbo
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
